short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract Instagram follower and following, comment and export to CSV with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turbo IG Exporter: Effortlessly Export Instagram Follower Data to CSV

Description: Turbo IG Exporter is a powerful tool designed to help you export Instagram followers, following lists, and comments directly to CSV format with just one click. Ideal for influencers, marketers, and anyone who needs to manage their Instagram data effectively.

###Key Features:

* One-Click Export: Instantly export followers, following, and comments from any Instagram profile.
* Massive Data Handling: Export up to 100,000 followers, following, and comments without hassle.
* CSV Format Support: Easily convert Instagram data into CSV files for seamless integration with Excel and other tools.
* Rate Limit Management: Automatically handles Instagram's rate limit errors, ensuring smooth operation.

###Supported Data Columns:

* Instagram ID
* Username
* Full Name
* Profile URL
* Avatar URL
* Comment
* Date of Comment

###How to Use Turbo IG Exporter:

1. Click the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the popup.
2. Navigate to the “Home” Tab.
3. Enter the Instagram username or comment URL you wish to export.
4. Click the “Export” button and follow the on-screen instructions.

###Important Notes:

Freemium Model: Export up to 800 followers for free. To unlock more extensive data exports, consider upgrading.
Easy Account Setup: Upgrade by creating an account or logging in with your Google account.

Get started today with Turbo IG Exporter and take control of your Instagram data!
